# UIImage.ResizingMode.stretch

**Case**

The image is stretched when it is resized. In other words, the interior region of the original image will be scaled to fill in the interior region of the newly resized imaged.

## Declaration

```swift
case stretch
```

## Constants

- **UIImage.ResizingMode.tile**: The image is tiled when it is resized. In other words, the interior region of the original image will be repeated to fill in the interior region of the newly resized image.

items.description: The image is tiled when it is resized. In other words, the interior region of the original image will be repeated to fill in the interior region of the newly resized image.
